entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
